swill.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to wash something by pouring a lot of water over it or into it
swill.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Get a bucket to swill the yard down.
swill.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if a liquid swills around or you swill it around, it moves around something
swill.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He swilled his brandy gently round his glass.
swill.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to drink something in large amounts
swill.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: He does nothing but swill beer all day.
swill.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: food for pigs, mostly made of unwanted bits of human food
swill.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: the act of washing something by pouring a lot of water over it
